name: 鄭以旋
objective: This course will teach the use of English in the field of mechanical and electrical engineering through the reading of relevant literature. In addition, the United Nation's Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) will be introduced. All areas of English proficiency (listening, speaking, writing, reading) will be considered.

scorePolicy:
Attendance policy:
Seven or more absences from Week 3 onwards will result in a grade of 0% for the course.   

Assessment:
Group presentation (speaking)　　　　20%
School Mid-term　　　　　　　　20%
Writing test*　　　　　　　　　　10%　　　　
Final exam* (reading and listening)　　　　40%
Attendance and participation　　　　10%　　　　

* At the lecturer’s sole discretion, a make-up Writing Test or Final Exam may be granted upon presentation of a valid proof of illness (medical certificate or record of hospitalization) within 10 days of the date of absence.
